explains: n. 豌豆（粒）；豆角；<西印度>豆荚
wordGroup: green pea 嫩豌豆；青豌豆
pea soup 干碗豆汤；浓豌豆汤
sweet pea n. [植]香豌豆；[植]麝香豌豆花

sentences.en: The tumour had shrunk to the size of a pea.
sentences.cn: 肿瘤已缩小到豌豆大小。

sentences.en: Pea pods burst open when overripe.
Each pea and peach on the beach can be reached by the peacock.
sentences.cn: 海滩上的每一颗豌豆和桃子孔雀都能触及。
